Token.Abstract: Bit6AudioRecorderController is used to record an audio file and attach it to a message.
Tries to start to record an audio file showing an <UIAlertView> object as the UI control to cancel or finish the recording.

Parameter.Name: msg
Parameter.Abstract: a Bit6OutgoingMessage object where the audio file will be included.

Parameter.Name: maxDuration
Parameter.Abstract: maximum allowed duration (in seconds) of the audio file to be recorded.

Parameter.Name: delegate
Parameter.Abstract: the delegate to be notified when the recording has been completed or canceled. For details about the methods that can be implemented by the delegate, see Bit6AudioRecorderControllerDelegate Protocol Reference.

Parameter.Name: noMicBlock
Parameter.Abstract: block to call if the user disabled access to the microphone
